Indices:
  Concepts
  Commands
  Variables
  • ..arrowsize.., size of arrows
  • ..batch.., flag used for batch mode
  • ..blue..
  • ..debug.., flag used for debugging
  • ..debug.., for debugging (by normal users)
  • ..eof.., flag indicating end-of-file
  • ..exit_status.., exit status from system call ... see Built-in Variables.
  • ..fontsize.., size of letters
  • ..graylevel.., graylevel (0=black)
  • ..image_height.., height of image
  • ..image_width.., width of image
  • ..length_blank.., length/cm of blanks <1> ... see Built-in Variables.
  • ..length_blank.., length/cm of blanks
  • ..length_dash.., length/cm of dashes <1> ... see Built-in Variables.
  • ..length_dash.., length/cm of dashes
  • ..linewidth.., width of lines
  • ..linewidthaxis.., width of lines on axis ... see Built-in Variables.
  • ..linewidthsymbol.., width of lines in symbols ... see Built-in Variables.
  • ..missingvalue.., missing value code
  • ..missingvalue.., value for missing data
  • ..num_col_data.., number column data <1> ... see Manipulation of Columns etc.
  • ..num_col_data.., number column data
  • ..publication.., flag for final copy of plot ... see Built-in Variables.
  • ..superuser.., for debugging (by developers)
  • ..superuser.., was -superuser flag set? ... see Built-in Variables.
  • ..symbolsize.., size of symbols
  • ..tic_direction.., direction of axis tics ... see Built-in Variables.
  • ..tic_size.., size/cm of axis tics
  • ..trace.., for tracing program execution ... see Built-in Variables.
  • ..use_default_for_query.., simulate -yes commandline flag ... see Invoking Gri.
  • ..words_in_dataline..
  • ..xinc.., x increment on axes <1>
  • ..xinc.., x increment on axes
  • ..xlast.., last drawn x value
  • ..xleft.., x value at left of plot <1>
  • ..xleft.., x value at left of plot
  • ..xmargin.., left margin <1>
  • ..xmargin.., left margin
  • ..xright.., x value at right of plot <1> ... see Built-in Variables.
  • ..xright.., x value at right of plot
  • ..xsize.., x-axis length <1>
  • ..xsize.., x-axis length
  • ..ybottom.., y value at bottom of plot <1> ... see Built-in Variables.
  • ..ybottom.., y value at bottom of plot
  • ..yinc.., y increment on axes <1>
  • ..yinc.., y increment on axes
  • ..ylast.., last drawn y value
  • ..ymargin.., bottom margin <1>
  • ..ymargin.., bottom margin
  • ..ysize.., y-axis length <1>
  • ..ysize.., y-axis length
  • ..ytop.., y value at top of plot <1>
  • ..ytop.., y value at top of plot

  • \.home., home directory ... see Important Builtin Synonyms.

  • \.pid., process ID of job ... see Important Builtin Synonyms.

  • \.ps_file., PostScript file name ... see Important Builtin Synonyms.
  • \.readfrom_file., data file name ... see Important Builtin Synonyms.

  • \.system., operating system name ... see Important Builtin Synonyms.
  • \.time., time and date ... see Important Builtin Synonyms.
  • \.user., user's login name ... see Important Builtin Synonyms.
